  • Tell Me More

This site was created to showcase my interests and projects.

My name is Thomas Wilson.
I'm an Engineer living in Houston, TX.
I've worked in the semiconductor industry since 2011.
I am passionate about data analysis and visualization.

I solve interesting problems with the tools at hand

I worked at Samsung in Austin, TX in the Dry Etch Department. Etching patterns into silicon wafers in order to create functioning LSI microchips for mobile applications.
